sentence.Network_en: Fon and Yoruba are widely spoken in the north.

sentence.Network_en: Almost 5 % of all Yoruba births produce twins.
sentence.Network_cn: 约鲁巴几乎5%的新生儿是双胞胎.

sentence.Network_en: Any of several West African languages belong to the South Central Niger including Yoruba.
sentence.Network_cn: 西非语言的任何一种都属于中南尼日尔语系,包括约鲁巴语.

非洲约鲁巴人（Yoruba）使用一种名叫iyoobu的固体盐。他们用一块布将盐包裹起来并在水中挤压它。

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a West African people living chiefly in southwestern Nigeria
2. a Kwa language spoken by the Yoruba people in southwestern Nigeria
